scripts.dev:aspida: npm run build:aspida && cd packages/aspida && node bin/index.js --build
scripts.dev:aspida-v2: npm run build:aspida-v2 && cd packages/aspida-v2 && node bin/index.js --build
scripts.build:aspida: npm run rimraf -- aspida && tsc -p packages/aspida
scripts.build:aspida-v2: npm run rimraf -- aspida-v2 && tsc -p packages/aspida-v2
scripts.build:axios: npm run rimraf -- aspida-axios && tsc -p packages/aspida-axios
scripts.build:fetch: npm run rimraf -- aspida-fetch && tsc -p packages/aspida-fetch
scripts.build:node-fetch: npm run rimraf -- aspida-node-fetch && tsc -p packages/aspida-node-fetch
scripts.build:react-query: npm run rimraf -- aspida-react-query && tsc -p packages/aspida-react-query
scripts.build:swr: npm run rimraf -- aspida-swr && tsc -p packages/aspida-swr
scripts.build:swrv: npm run rimraf -- aspida-swrv && tsc -p packages/aspida-swrv
scripts.release:major: npm run release -- --release-as major && npm run dev:aspida-v2 && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.release:minor: npm run release -- --release-as minor && npm run dev:aspida-v2 && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.release:patch: npm run release -- --release-as patch && npm run dev:aspida-v2 && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit
